items.title: Address only (user picks amount)
items.expected: Send screen; user can enter amount and optional comment.

items.title: Text only
items.expected: Send screen with comment prefilled; user can enter amount.

items.title: Amount
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; no comment.

items.title: Amount + text
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount and comment.

items.title: DNS address + amount
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; DNS resolved.

items.title: Unknown parameter (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. Any parameters not defined by the standard must cause an error.

items.title: Amount + bin
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; includes binary payload (bin); text 'bin' (default bin).

items.title: Text + bin (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. text and bin are mutually exclusive.

items.title: bin without amount (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. bin requires amount.

items.title: Amount + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: Amount + text + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount and comment; valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: Text + exp (no amount)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. exp requires amount.

items.title: Amount + bin + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; includes binary payload (bin); text 'bin' (default bin); valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: Expired (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. Current time > exp.

items.title: Amount + very large exp (wallet clamps)
items.expected: Wallet should send with its default TTL (e.g., ~5 minutes) even though exp is far in the future.

items.title: Amount + init
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; includes StateInit; init field present with value b5ee9c720101010100060000080f0a72a5.

items.title: Amount + init + text
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount and comment; includes StateInit; init field present with value b5ee9c720101010100060000080f0a72a5.

items.title: Amount + init + bin
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; includes StateInit and binary payload (bin); init field present with value b5ee9c720101010100060000080f0a72a5; text 'bin' (default bin).

items.title: Amount + init + bin + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; includes StateInit and binary payload (bin); init field present with value b5ee9c720101010100060000080f0a72a5; text 'bin' (default bin); valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: Amount + init + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing amount; includes StateInit; init field present with value b5ee9c720101010100060000080f0a72a5; valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: init without amount (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. init requires amount.

items.title: init + text without amount (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. init requires amount.

items.title: init + exp without amount (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. exp requires amount; init requires amount.

items.title: init + bin without amount (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. bin requires amount; init requires amount.

items.title: Jetton master only
items.expected: Jetton send screen; user can enter amount and optional comment.

items.title: Jetton + text (no amount)
items.expected: Jetton send screen with comment prefilled; user can enter amount.

items.title: Jetton + amount
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing jetton amount; no comment.

items.title: Jetton + amount + text
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing jetton amount and comment.

items.title: Jetton + amount + bin
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing jetton amount; includes binary payload (bin); text 'bin' (default bin).

items.title: Jetton + amount + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing jetton amount; valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: Jetton + exp (no amount)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. exp requires amount.

items.title: Jetton + bin without amount (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. bin requires amount.

items.title: Jetton + text + bin (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. text and bin are mutually exclusive.

items.title: Jetton expired (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. Current time > exp.

items.title: Jetton + DNS address
items.expected: Jetton send screen; DNS resolved; user can enter amount.

items.title: Jetton + DNS address + amount
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing jetton amount; DNS resolved.

items.title: Jetton + amount + init (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. StateInit is not allowed for jetton transfers.

items.title: Jetton + amount + bin + exp
items.expected: Confirmation screen showing jetton amount; includes binary payload (bin); text 'bin' (default bin); valid until exp; after expiration wallet rejects.

items.title: Unknown parameter (invalid)
items.expected: Expected: Reject. Any parameters not defined by the standard must cause an error.

items.title: Buy TON
items.expected: Opens on‑ramp flow.

items.title: Staking
items.expected: Opens staking screen.

items.title: Pool/{ADDRESS}
items.expected: Opens a specific liquidity pool.

items.title: Exchange (provider only)
items.expected: Opens exchange with selected provider.

items.title: Exchange (provider + toToken)
items.expected: Opens exchange with provider and target token.

items.title: Swap from TON to USDT
items.expected: Opens swap interface prefilled.

items.title: Battery (with promocode)
items.expected: Opens battery screen.

items.title: Action (eventId)
items.expected: Opens transaction bottom sheet for eventId.

items.title: DApp (catalog) https URL
items.expected: Opens in‑app browser with a DApp from catalog.
